Package org.magelan.core

Interface Summary
CoreModel  
Derivate Derivates are meant to provide specific rendering or additional functionality to their parent DrawingModels, but without being independent drawings themselves.
Entity An interface, representing a graphical entity.
EntityModifier Used to drag & drop modify entities.
ExplodableEntity Defines an explodable entity.
RotatableEntity Defines a rotatable entity.
 

Class Summary
Block A block definition.
CoreRenderer The default core drawing model / entity renderer.
DefaultCoreModel The default drawing implementation.
DefaultCoreModelBeanInfo DefaultCoreModel bean info class.
DefaultEntity A default graphical entity implementation.
DefaultEntityBeanInfo DefaultEntity bean info class.
ExplodableEntity.ArrayIterator An array iterator to be used by implamentations of the ExplodableEntity.explode() method.
GeomFactory A factory class to feed Entity.getShape() methods with flyweight Shapes.
NamedViewport Defines metods to translate abstract drawing coordinates to scaled, ready to draw on screen, coordinates.
PaintFactory A factory class for Paint instances.
 

Exception Summary
DrawingException An exception to be thrown by org.magelan.core classes.
